status_notes: Case Closed. Case Noted. The tree in question is under warranty for two years from the date it was planted. All new trees are inspected every summer during the warranty period to make sure they are alive and healthy. If a tree is found to be dead it will be replaced in following planting season. The watering of the new trees is up to the contractor who planted the tree. The Parks Department also relies on the businesses/homeowners where the trees are planted to help water the trees. Tree pit and sidewalk upkeep including removing trash and weeds is the responsibility of the business/homeowner.
